CARD_MAIN.TEXT_1: Bai Ganio is a fictional character and protagonist in a series of satirical feuilletons by the Bulgarian writer, lawyer and public figure Aleko Konstantinov.
CARD_MAIN.TEXT_2: Aleko created a character bigger than himself.
CARD_MAIN.TEXT_3: And like him, I'm creating a GitHub ecosystem bigger than a single repo — a living, self‑maintaining knowledge graph.

CARD_1.TITLE: Cosmic Origins
CARD_1.SUBTITLE: collection of real images
CARD_1.BACK_TITLE: The unified data hub of the known universe
CARD_1.BACK_TEXT: Astonishing image collections of exoplanets and moons, nebulas and galaxies, star dwarfs — you name it.

CARD_2.TITLE: Food Cost
CARD_2.SUBTITLE: food as energy to money
CARD_2.BACK_TITLE: Think you know your real food bill?
CARD_2.Q1: Do you know how much food you waste and overconsume?
CARD_2.Q2: Do you know how much must be produced to satisfy that?
CARD_2.Q3: Do you know how much energy that is?
